name: Paragonimiasis - LEGACY
description:
Paragonimiasis -  Legacy  is a small game / simulation of the spreading of the flat worm Paragonimus, parasite found in crab transmitted to humans when they eat raw parasited crabs. Crabs and humans can be on of three states : Ill , Healthy, Immune.

Two simulations modes :
- observation mode : only NPC
- participation mode : user can join the fun
